mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE COM_NUM IS NULL AND SELL_TYPE = 'N' AND APPOINT_TYPE = 'N' ORDER BY LIKE_NUM DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE CAT_NUM = #{catNum} AND COM_NUM IS NULL AND SELL_TYPE = 'N' AND APPOINT_TYPE = 'N' ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE COM_NUM IS NULL AND SELL_TYPE = 'N' AND APPOINT_TYPE = 'N' ORDER BY CLICK_NUM DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{limit}

SELECT * FROM PRODUCT
TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND COM_NUM IS NULL
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE CAT_NUM = #{catNum} AND COM_NUM IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PRODUCT WHERE CAT_NUM = #{catNum} AND COM_NUM IS NULL

SELECT * FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN USERS U ON P.USER_NUM = U.USER_NUM
AND P.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND P.CAT_NUM = #{catNum}
AND P.PRICE >= #{minPrice}
AND P.PRICE <= #{maxPrice}
AND P.SELL_TYPE = 'N' AND P.APPOINT_TYPE = 'N'
AND P.COM_NUM IS NULL
ORDER BY P.INPUT_DATE DESC
ORDER BY P.PRICE ASC
ORDER BY P.PRICE DESC
ORDER BY ( NVL(P.LIKE_NUM,0) * 0.5 + NVL(P.CLICK_NUM,0)* 0.3 + NVL(U.MANNER,0) * 0.2 ) DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT P.*, C.COM_NAME FROM PRODUCT P JOIN COMPANY C ON P.COM_NUM = C.COM_NUM WHERE P.COM_NUM IS NOT NULL AND P.SELL_TYPE = 'Y' AND P.HIDDEN_TYPE = 'N' ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 )
